name: run
description: Run a terminax script file (and wait for it to finish). Also see 'runasync'.

name: runasync
description: Run a terminax script file async (run in the background). Also see 'run'.

name: return
description: Exit a script or function, optionally with a return value.

name: exit
description: Immediately exit a script or custom function.

name: wait
description: Wait for some number of ms before continuuing the script [1000ms = 1sec].
